--- title: "2.1 — Tariffs — Class Content" execute: freeze: auto --- ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.callout-note appearance="minimal"} # Meeting Date *Thursday, March 8, 2023* ::: ::: callout-warning # Upcoming Assignment The [Midterm Exam](/assignment/midterm) is due by 11:59 PM Friday March 10 on Blackboard Assignments. ::: ## Overview Today, we begin trade policies by looking at the ubiquitous form of trade policy: tariffs (taxes) on imports. We might not finish today, and wrap up a few more things about tariffs next class, where we examine other types of trade barriers like quotas and subsidies. ## Readings - Chapter 8.2-8.4 in Feenstra & Taylor We will cover the material in 8.1 (trade agreements) at the end of the course, and 8.5 (quotas) next class. ## Slides Below, you can find the slides in two formats. Clicking the image will bring you to the html version of the slides in a new tab. The lower button will allow you to download a PDF version of the slides. ::: callout-tip You can type h to see a special list of viewing options, and type o for an outline view of all the slides. ::: I suggest printing the slides beforehand and using them to take additional notes in class (*not everything* is in the slides)!

Download as PDF

## Assignments ### Problem Set 2 Due Thursday February 23 [Problem Set 2](/assignment/02-problem-set) (1.1-1.8) is due by 11:59 PM Thursday February 23 on Blackboard Assignments.
